title: Sentences for children, English and Latine collected out of sundry authors long since / by Leonard Culman ; and now translated into English by Charles Hoole, for the first enterers into Latin.
author: Culmann, Leonhard, 1498?-1562.
publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers,
notes: English and Latin on opposite pages with duplicate numbering.
Title on added t.p.: Sententiae pueriles anglo-latinae.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
